meanings.definition: A North American plant with bright red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The firepinks in the garden added a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: I love how vibrant the firepinks look in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The firepinks seemed to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as firepinks in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The firepinks stood out like little flames in the meadow.

meanings.definition: The bright red flowers of the firepinks plant.
meanings.sent1: She picked a bouquet of firepinks for the table centerpiece.
meanings.sent2: The firepinks were a favorite among the local pollinators.
meanings.sent3: The firepinks looked like tiny red stars scattered across the field.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as bright as a cluster of firepinks.
meanings.sent5: The firepinks glowed in the sunlight like tiny lanterns.
